headline: Is Ameren (AEE) Pricing Look Stretched After Recent Share Gains And Mixed Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether Ameren is fairly priced or offering value right now, you are not alone. Utilities often look steady on the surface while the real story sits in the valuation details. Ameren shares last closed at US$104.00, with returns of 4.1% over 7 days, 5.6% over 30 days, 3.1% year to date, 13.7% over 1 year, 31.8% over 3 years and 65.2% over 5 years, which hints at changing views on both growth potential and risk. Recent attention on utilities like Ameren has been shaped by...
